Package org.neo4j.io.fs

Interface ChecksumWriter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlushableChecksumChannel, FlushablePositionAwareChecksumChannel, WritableChecksumChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhysicalFlushableChecksumChannel, PhysicalFlushableLogChannel, PositionAwarePhysicalFlushableChecksumChannel
    public interface ChecksumWriter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Supplier<Checksum> CHECKSUM_FACTORY
      Even though the Checksum.getValue() returns a long, this is currently casted down to an integer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void beginChecksum()
      Begin a new checksum segment.
      int putChecksum()
      Calculate the checksum of the produced stream, since the last call to beginChecksum(), and insert it at the end of the channel.

    • Field Detail

      • CHECKSUM_FACTORY

        static final Supplier<Checksum> CHECKSUM_FACTORY
        Even though the Checksum.getValue() returns a long, this is currently casted down to an integer.

    • Method Detail

      • beginChecksum

        void beginChecksum()
        Begin a new checksum segment.

      • putChecksum

        int putChecksum()
         throws IOException
        Calculate the checksum of the produced stream, since the last call to beginChecksum(), and insert it at the end of the channel.
        Returns:
        the calculated checksum.
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error from channel.
